items.sentence: Tom will soon be able to do that without any help.
What makes you think Tom would be able to do that?
What's the real reason Tom didn't want to do that?
I hope you're not planning to do that by yourself.
The talk lasted half an hour longer than expected.
Why didn't you take the parcel to the post office?
I may be clumsy, but I'm not as clumsy as you are.
How can you tell a good watermelon from a bad one?
I should probably go visit Tom tomorrow afternoon.
Tom is only going to be in Boston for three weeks.
